sections.heading: aid; conscientious objectors denied relief
sections.text: No benefit shall accrue to, and none of the provisions of sections 80-401 to 80-405 shall apply to conscientious objectors who availed themselves of the privilege of any exemption from military duty.SourceLaws 1921, c. 40, ยง 1, p. 181;C.S.1922, ยง 6206;Laws
